trends: There have been 95 other sightings in Atlanta
There was one other sighting in Atlanta on or around October 30th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking out back window, I saw a large object go over our house, no noise, I yelled for my husband to go to the front of the house. I was the size of a small car. It had red lights blinking out of each side of it, it was yellow, no noise. dropped to almost roof top levels. We were kind of overwelmed.It flew and then dissappeared.
